Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 13 Piṭṭhiduka » 13.1 Dassanenapahātabbaduka » 13.1.7 Pañhāvāra » 13.1.7.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 13.1.7.2.1 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Piṭṭhiduka
Dassanenapahātabbaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
32.
4132Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare satta, nasahajāte pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, nanissaye pañca, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte cha, napacchājāte satta…pe…  namagge satta, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte cattāri, noatthiyā cattāri, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta, noavigate cattāri.
<< 13.1.7.2.1 Saṅkhyāvāraup13.1.7.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya >>
